comment.language: The hymn "Saved Amen (Cwyic a~m/n)" is not chanted since salvation was completed on the Cross.

language.div: Himne "Saved Amin (Sotis Amin)" tidak lagi dinyanyikan karena keselamatan telah digenapi di kayu Salib.

comment.language: After the Thanksgiving prayer, "Saved Amen (Cwyic a~m/n)" is chanted in the quick tune, followed by "His Foundations (Nefcen])" and "Mother Zion (Ciwn ]mau)"
Setelah doa Syukur, "Saved Amin (Sotis Amin)" dinyanyikan dengan irama cepat, diikuti oleh "Dasar-Nya (Nefsenti)" dan "Tuhan Berkata ya Ibu Sion (Siyon Timav)."
After the Thanksgiving Prayer, the congregation chants the hymn "Saved- (Cw-)" followed by "Saved Amen (-yic a~m/n)" after the Absolution of the Servants.

language.div: Setelah Doa Syukur, jemaat menyanyikan himne "Saved- (Soooo-)" diikuti oleh "Saved Amin (tiiiiis Amin)" setelah Absolusi Para Pelayan.

comment.language: Or if the Pope, a metropolitan, or a bishop is present, "All You Wise Men (Nicabeu t/rou)" is chanted followed by "Saved Amen (Cwyic a~m/n)".

language.div: Apabila Paus, seorang metropolitan, atau seorang uskup hadir, "Semua Orang Bijak Israel (Nisavev Tiro)" dinyanyikan diikuti oleh "Saved Amin (Sotis Amin)."

comment.language: Contrary to some practices, this is not a joyous hymn. Although optional on feast days, it is, as indicated, chanted primarily in the presence of the Pope, a metropolitan, or a bishop, regardless of time of year.

Berlawanan dengan beberapa praktik, himne ini bukanlah himne yang menggembirakan. Meskipun bersifat opsional pada hari raya, nyanyian ini terutama dilantunkan di hadapan Paus, seorang metropolitan, atau uskup, tanpa memandang waktu dalam setahun.
